Title: Battle at Big Rock
Writer: Emily Carmichael, Colin Trevorrow, Michael Crichton (based on the novel "Jurassic Park" by)
Actors: André Holland, Natalie Martinez, Melody Hurd, Pierson Salvador
Plot: A family on a camping trip to Big Rock National Park, about 20 miles from where Fallen Kingdom has ended, take part in the first major confrontation between dinosaurs and humans.
